channel.title: How do i make a .java file for a .class file?
channel.description:
hey pplz, i was just wondering if anyone knows how to make a .java file because all i have is .class files, but i need the .java to edit them. well, any help would be awsome, thanks pplz.
**is there a converter?**

item.title: How do i make a .java file for a .class file?
item.dc:creator: @daxter852 daxter852
item.description:
@daxter852 wrote:

[quote=“lary370, post:16, topic:333217”][quote author=ILOVEJAVA link=topic=429630.msg3155132#msg3155132 date=1268953969]

Copy and paste another java file Exam. Player.java right click and press copy. Then right click and paste. Now u have java file called Copy player.java. Rename it and open and press ctrl + a and press delete button. Then paste your code in it. When ur rdy just compile and if compiling doesnt go error it will make at the same time the class file. Easy thing.

sooooo…open the .class…copy all…paste in a dif file called (title).java…then…compile?
[/quote]

DO NOT DO WHAT HE SAID THATS A GOOD WAY TO CRASH YOUR COMPUTER![/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a .java file for a .class file?

item.title: How do i make a .java file for a .class file?

Copy and paste another java file Exam. Player.java right click and press copy. Then right click and paste. Now u have java file called Copy player.java. Rename it and open and press ctrl + a and press delete button. Then paste your code in it. When ur rdy just compile and if compiling doesnt go error it will make at the same time the class file. Easy thing.
[/quote]
sooooo…open the .class…copy all…paste in a dif file called (title).java…then…compile?[/quote]

DO NOT DO WHAT HE SAID THATS A GOOD WAY TO CRASH YOUR COMPUTER!

item.title: How do i make a .java file for a .class file?
item.dc:creator: @ILOVEJAVA ILOVEJAVA
item.description:
@ILOVEJAVA wrote:

deathschaos9:

When you open a class file in CavaJ, you save it as a java file… Thats it.

ugh, im so confused. sorry. i opened a .class file, copied all of it, pasted in cavaj, and saved as .java…opened it, and it’s the same thing as it was. didn’t decompile…i don’t know what i am doing wrong…and i don’t really get how cavaj is anything like a decompiler…
sorry, im just really iritated and this shit is sooo confusing…

Read full topic
